title: Subtitling font used in norwegian broadcasting
content:
Hey,

I’m looking to find out what this font is. It’s used by NRK, the norwegian state broadcaster, to subtitle all programs that need subtitling. Looking to use it to subtitle my own film :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905123758im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/nrktekst_6253.png)

Thanks in advance!

 [‹ Museum logo typeface identification](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905123758/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44568 "Go to previous forum topic") [What is this?!?! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905123758/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45677 "Go to next forum topic")
author: elnitter

comments.content:
I think this is Helvetic Neue Condensed Medium, perhaps with a touch of additional horizontal scaling.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/helvetica-neue/cond-medium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905123758/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/helvetica-neue/cond-medium/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/helvetica-neue/cond-medium/")
That looks just right! Thanks a lot, that’ll save me a lot of time looking for another typeface that would’ve been good enough!
